discovery.v2.attractions.name: Attraction Search
discovery.v2.attractions.description: Find attractions (artists, sports, packages, plays and so on) and filter your search by name, and much more.

sort.name: sort
sort.doc: Sorting order of the search result

source.name: source
source.doc: Filter entities by its source name

includeTest.name: includeTest
includeTest.doc: True if you want to have entities flag as test in the response. Only, if you only wanted test entities

locale.name: locale
locale.doc: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

discovery.v2.attractions.id.name: Get Attraction Details
discovery.v2.attractions.id.description: Get details for a specific attraction using the unique identifier for the attraction.

locale.name: locale
locale.doc: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

discovery.v2.classifications.name: Classification Search
discovery.v2.classifications.description: Find classifications and filter your search by name, and much more. Classifications help define the nature of attractions and events.

sort.name: sort
sort.doc: Sorting order of the search result

source.name: source
source.doc: Filter entities by its source name

includeTest.name: includeTest
includeTest.doc: True if you want to have entities flag as test in the response. Only, if you only wanted test entities

locale.name: locale
locale.doc: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

discovery.v2.classifications.genres.id.name: Get Genre Details
discovery.v2.classifications.genres.id.description: Get details for a specific genre using its unique identifier.

locale.name: locale
locale.doc: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

discovery.v2.classifications.segments.id.name: Get Segment Details
discovery.v2.classifications.segments.id.description: Get details for a specific segment using its unique identifier.

locale.name: locale
locale.doc: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

discovery.v2.classifications.subgenres.i.name: Get Sub-Genre Details
discovery.v2.classifications.subgenres.i.description: Get details for a specific sub-genre using its unique identifier.

locale.name: locale
locale.doc: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

discovery.v2.classifications.id.name: Get Classification Details
discovery.v2.classifications.id.description: Get details for a specific segment, genre, or sub-genre using its unique identifier.

id.name: id
id.doc: ID of the segment, genre, or sub-genre

locale.name: locale
locale.doc: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

discovery.v2.events.name: Event Search
discovery.v2.events.description: Find events and filter your search by location, date, availability, and much more.

sort.name: sort
sort.doc: Sorting order of the search result

latlong.name: latlong
latlong.doc: Filter events by latitude and longitude

radius.name: radius
radius.doc: Radius of the area in which we want to search for events.

startDateTime.name: startDateTime
startDateTime.doc: Filter events with a start date after this date

endDateTime.name: endDateTime
endDateTime.doc: Filter events with a start date before this date

onsaleStartDateTime.name: onsaleStartDateTime
onsaleStartDateTime.doc: Filter events with onsale start date after this date

onsaleEndDateTime.name: onsaleEndDateTime
onsaleEndDateTime.doc: Filter events with onsale end date before this date

classificationName.name: classificationName
classificationName.doc: Filter events by classification name: name of any segment, genre, sub-genre, type, sub-type

classificationId.name: classificationId
classificationId.doc: Filter events by classification id: id of any segment, genre, sub-genre, type, sub-type

includeTBA.name: includeTBA
includeTBA.doc: True, to include events with date to be announce (TBA)

includeTBD.name: includeTBD
includeTBD.doc: True, to include event with a date to be defined (TBD)

source.name: source
source.doc: Filter entities by its source name

includeTest.name: includeTest
includeTest.doc: True if you want to have entities flag as test in the response. Only, if you only wanted test entities

locale.name: locale
locale.doc: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

discovery.v2.events.id.name: Get Event Details
discovery.v2.events.id.description: Get details for a specific event using the unique identifier for the event. This includes the venue and location, the attraction(s), and the Ticketmaster Website URL for purchasing tickets for the event.

locale.name: locale
locale.doc: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

discovery.v2.events.id.images.name: Get Event Images
discovery.v2.events.id.images.description: Get images for a specific event using the unique identifier for the event.

locale.name: locale
locale.doc: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used.

discovery.v2.venues.description: Find venues and filter your search by name, and much more.

sort.doc: Sorting order of the search result

stateCode.name: stateCode

locale.name: locale
